chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: Ordered.sort Label
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
PtsNonEmpty: is_true (pts != [::])
d: dstatelet
r: nat
nd: data
lg: Log
pt: Equality.sort [ordType of nid]
from: Ordered.sort [ordType of nid]
h: heap
to: nat
m: TaggedMessage

Goal:
coh d -> from != pt -> from != cn -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d r nd lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit {| dstate := upd from h (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} r nd lg pt

Premises:
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
post_msg = fun (s : soup) (m : msg TaggedMessage) => (s \+ fresh s \\-> m, fresh s) : soup -> msg TaggedMessage -> soup * mid
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
Notation seq := list
pt_PhaseTwoCommit = fun (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (l : Log) (pt : nid) => [\/ [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) l pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.commit_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)], [/\ pt_state d (round, PCommitted next_data) (rcons l (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)] | [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons l (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
Notation heap := Heap.heap
content : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> mtype
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
active : forall mtype : Type, msg mtype -> bool
data = seq nid : Set
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
nid = nat : Set
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Log = seq (bool * seq nat) : Set
Notation ordType := Ordered.type
upd : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> V -> cT -> cT
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
pt_PhaseOneE' : forall (d : dstatelet) (r : nat) (nd : data) (lg : Log) (pt from : [ordType of nid]) (h : heap) (to : nat) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> from != pt -> from != cn -> pt_PhaseOne d r nd lg pt -> pt_PhaseOne {| dstate := upd from h (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} r nd lg pt
pt_PhaseOneRespondedE' : forall (d : dstatelet) (r : nat) (nd : data) (lg : Log) (pt from : [ordType of nid]) (h : heap) (to : nat) (m : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), coh d -> from != pt -> from != cn -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d r nd lg b pt -> pt_PhaseOneResponded {| dstate := upd from h (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} r nd lg b pt
pt_InitE : forall (d : dstatelet) (r : nat) (lg : Log) (pt from : [ordType of nid]) (h : heap) (to : nat) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> from != pt -> from != cn -> pt_Init d r lg pt -> pt_Init {| dstate := upd from h (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} r lg pt
pt_PhaseTwoCommitE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (ds : heap) (from to : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseTwoAbortE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (ds : heap) (from to : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg pt
pt_InitE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : nat_eqType) (to : [ordType of nid]) (m : TaggedMessage), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_Init d e lg pt -> pt_Init {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e lg pt
pt_PhaseOneE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : nat_eqType) (to : [ordType of nid]) (m : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd to ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt != to -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseOne d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseOne d' e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseOneRespondedE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (from : [ordType of nid]), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != from -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseOneResponded {| dstate := upd from ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg b pt
pt_PhaseTwoCommitE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d' e dt lg pt
pt_state_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : heap) (ps : PStateT) (lg : Log) (pt : [ordType of nid]) (i : mid) (n : [ordType of nid]), pt != n -> coh d -> pt_state d ps lg pt -> pt_state {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} ps lg pt
pt_state_soupE : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : soup) (h : heap) (ps : PStateT) (lg : Log) (pt n : [ordType of nid]), coh d -> pt != n -> pt_state d ps lg pt -> pt_state {| dstate := upd n h (dstate d); dsoup := ds |} ps lg pt
cn_state_soupE : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : soup) (this : [ordType of nid]) (h : heap) (cs : CStateT) (lg : Log), coh d -> this != cn -> cn_state d cs lg -> cn_state {| dstate := upd this h (dstate d); dsoup := ds |} cs lg
cn_state_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (ds : heap) (cs : CStateT) (lg : Log) (i : mid) (n : [ordType of nid]), cn != n -> coh d -> cn_state d cs lg -> cn_state {| dstate := upd n ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} cs lg
commit_req_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := cn; to := pt; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round, PRespondedYes next_data) lg pt, msg_spec cn pt Exports.commit_req [:: round] (dsoup d) & no_msg_from_to pt cn (dsoup d)]
cn_PhaseOneReceive_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log) (recvd : seq (nid * bool)) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (from : nat), cn_PhaseOneReceive d round next_data lg recvd -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := cn; active := true |} -> from \in pts -> from \in [seq i.1 | i <- recvd] -> coh d -> cn_PhaseOneReceive {| dstate := upd cn (mkLocal (round, CWaitPrepResponse next_data recvd, lg)) (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} round next_data lg recvd
pt_PhaseTwoAbortE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseTwoAbort d' e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseOneE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseOne d e dt lg pt -> pt_PhaseOne d' e dt lg pt
pt_PhaseTwoRespondedE_consume : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : seq nat) (lg : seq (bool * seq nat)) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (ds : heap) (i : mid) (this : [ordType of nid]), coh d -> pt \in pts -> pt != this -> pt_PhaseTwoResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseTwoResponded {| dstate := upd this ds (dstate d); dsoup := consume_msg (dsoup d) i |} e dt lg b pt
commit_ack_pt_inv : forall (d : dstatelet) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage) (pt round : nat) (next_data : data) (lg : Log), tag m = commit_ack -> find i (dsoup d) = Some {| content := m; from := pt; to := cn; active := true |} -> pt_PhaseTwoCommit d round next_data lg pt -> [/\ pt_state d (round.+1, PInit) (rcons lg (true, next_data)) pt, no_msg_from_to cn pt (dsoup d) & msg_spec pt cn Exports.commit_ack [:: round] (dsoup d)]
no_msg_from_post : forall (from from' to : nid) (s : soup) (tms : TaggedMessage), valid s -> no_msg_from from s -> from' != from -> no_msg_from from (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from'; to := to; active := true |}).1
pt_PhaseOneRespondedE : forall (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (b : bool) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> loc z d' = loc z d) -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d e dt lg b pt -> pt_PhaseOneResponded d' e dt lg b pt
msg_specE_consume1 : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nat_eqType) (from : nat) (to : nid) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> pt != from -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
msg_specE : forall (s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (from to : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType), valid s -> no_msg_from_to from to s -> msg_spec from to tg cnt (post_msg s {| content := {| tag := tg; tms_cont := cnt |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |}).1
no_msg_from_toE : forall (from to : nat) (s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (tms : TaggedMessage) (to' : nat_eqType), valid s -> no_msg_from_to from to s -> (to == to') = false -> no_msg_from_to from to (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from; to := to'; active := true |}).1
msg_specE_consume2 : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nid) (from : nat) (to : nat_eqType) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> to != to' -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> loc n d = loc n {| dstate := upd m (loc m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
msg_specE' : forall (s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (from : nid) (to to' tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (tms : TaggedMessage), valid s -> (to == to') = false -> msg_spec from to tg cnt s -> msg_spec from to tg cnt (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from; to := to'; active := true |}).1
no_msg_from_toE' : forall (from to : nat) (s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from' : nat_eqType) (to' : nat), valid s -> no_msg_from_to from to s -> (from' == from) = false -> no_msg_from_to from to (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from'; to := to'; active := true |}).1
no_msg_from_to = fun (from to : nat) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nat -> nat -> soup -> Prop Arguments no_msg_from_to (_ _)%nat_scope
no_msg_from = fun (from : nid) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (to : nat) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nid -> soup -> Prop
msg_specE'' : forall (s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (from from' : nat_eqType) (to : nid) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (tms : TaggedMessage), valid s -> (from == from') = false -> msg_spec from to tg cnt s -> msg_spec from to tg cnt (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from'; to := to'; active := true |}).1
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
locU : forall (n n' : nat_eqType) (x : heap) (st : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap)) (s : soup), n != n' -> valid st -> loc n {| dstate := upd n' x st; dsoup := s |} = loc n {| dstate := st; dsoup := s |}
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
locE' : forall (d : dstatelet) (n : nid) (x : heap) (y : soup), valid (dstate d) -> loc n {| dstate := upd n x (dstate d); dsoup := y |} = x
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion
pt_not_cn : forall pt : nat_eqType, pt \in pts -> pt != cn

```  
intros.
intros coh_d.
intros from_neq_pt.
intros from_neq_cn.
intros pt_PhaseTwoCommit_d.
unfold pt_PhaseTwoCommit.
destruct pt_PhaseTwoCommit_d as [[pt_resp_yes_msg_spec pt_no_msg_from_to] | [pt_committed_msg_spec [cn_no_msg_from_to pt_no_msg_from]]].
- left. split.
  + unfold pt_state in pt_resp_yes_msg_spec.
    unfold pt_state.
    destruct pt_resp_yes_msg_spec as [state_pt resp_yes_msg_spec no_msg_from_to_pt_cn].
    split.
    * unfold pt_state.
      split. apply coh_d.
      exact state_pt.
    * split.
      { apply msg_specE' in resp_yes_msg_spec.
        + exact resp_yes_msg_spec.
        + apply pt_not_cn. exact Hnin.
        + auto. 
      }
      { exact no_msg_from_to. }
- right. split.
  + unfold pt_state in pt_committed_msg_spec.
    unfold pt_state.
    destruct pt_committed_msg_spec as [state_pt committed_msg_spec no_msg_from_cn_pt].
    split.
    * unfold pt_state.
      split.
      { apply coh_d. }
      exact state_pt.
    * split.
      { exact no_msg_from_cn_pt. }
      { exact pt_no_msg_from. }
```
